thread.title: Map Game: Where is Puerto Rico?
thread.title_full: Map Game: Where is Puerto Rico? - The Denver Post

author: Joe Murphy
title: Map Game: Where is Puerto Rico?
text:
Puerto Rico's statehood has been in the news , which leads us to ask:
Do you know where Puerto Rico is? Click and drag the marker to where you think Puerto Rico is on this map of the Caribbean (it's the crotch of the "x" that appears when you drag the marker that marks where your guess will count). When you drop it, the answer will appear, and you'll see how your guess compares with everyone else who has played.
On mobile? Play the map game here
Check back here Friday for a map of where everyone guessed Puerto Rico was.
